description: This file defines function prototypes for accessing and modifying device information parameters, specifically boolean and string values, within a device management data model library. It appears to be part of a larger codebase that deals with device configuration via a standardized interface.

methods.name: DeviceInfo_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves the boolean value of a specified device information parameter.

methods.name: DeviceInfo_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves the string value of a specified device information parameter.

methods.name: DeviceInfo_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets the boolean value of a specified device information parameter.

methods.name: DeviceInfo_SetParamStringValue
methods.description: Sets the string value of a specified device information parameter.
